snippet: Sprinter Sacre enhanced his reputation as one of Britain’s top horses by winning the Queen Mother Champion Chase by 19 lengths at the Cheltenham Festival.
lead_paragraph: Sprinter Sacre enhanced his reputation as one of Britain’s top horses by winning the Queen Mother Champion Chase by 19 lengths at the Cheltenham Festival.

headline.seo: Britain’s Sprinter Sacre All Alone at Finish
headline.main: Britain’s Sprinter Sacre All Alone at Finish
